channel.title: Help me with testscape source
channel.description:
umm i cant find a file to make myself admin in testscape..
help??[br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2007, 09:00:44 PM[/size][hr]anyone at al??

item.title: Help me with testscape source
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Go in your client.java and search for “(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(” until you see code that looks like this "if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“hi”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

This is where you make someone a mod or admin, if you want to make someone a mod its “playerRichts=1” for admin its “playerRights=2”, and for owners its “playerRights=3”. Once you have filled in the names of whos account you are upgrading to mod/admin just save and compile.

Read full topic
